title: Atlantic community: introducing Portugal
creator_credit: North Atlantic Treaty Organization and Europa Telefilm
brief_description: Describes the country and the people of Portugal - geographical features, historical development and achievements, economic life, occupations of the people, and social customs. Explains briefly the role of Portugal in the North Atlantic Treaty Organisation. Narrated by Robert Beatty.
